title: Simple multicellular animals: sponges, coelenterates and flatworms
brief_description: Begins with a study of volvox and then moves to sponges, coelenterates and flatworms as examples of multicellular animals. Covers anatomy, nerve structure, fading strategies and reproduction. No other credits available.
